title: Rooibos Almond Cake
description: Use rooibos tea as a liquid base in almond-flavored cake batter.

title: Rooibos Baked Apples
description: Core apples and bake with rooibos-infused raisins and cinnamon.

title: Rooibos Granola Bars
description: Bake oats, seeds, and rooibos in a honey binder.

title: Rooibos Fruit Compote
description: Cook seasonal fruits with rooibos and spices.

title: Rooibos Chocolate Mousse
description: Blend rooibos concentrate with melted chocolate and cream.

title: Rooibos Poached Pears
description: Simmer pears in rooibos with honey and cinnamon.

title: Rooibos Banana Bread
description: Add rooibos to your banana bread batter for depth.

title: Rooibos Pancakes
description: Substitute water with rooibos in your pancake recipe.

title: Rooibos Vanilla Cupcakes
description: Infuse rooibos in cupcake batter for subtle flavor.

title: Rooibos Date Balls
description: Blend dates, rooibos, oats, and coconut for energy bites.

title: Rooibos Chia Pudding
description: Soak chia in rooibos and coconut milk with maple syrup overnight.

title: Rooibos Jelly Cups
description: Make jelly using rooibos, sweetener, and gelatin or agar-agar.

title: Rooibos Apple Crumble
description: Bake rooibos-steeped apples with oat and cinnamon topping.

title: Rooibos Coconut Milk Popsicles
description: Freeze rooibos, coconut milk, and sweetener in molds.

title: Rooibos & Honey Ice Cream
description: Churn rooibos-infused cream with condensed milk and vanilla.
